participant_1.background:
My favorite music is chill music, as it helps me to relax and concentrate on my work.
I would like to have a job where I can use my creativity and technical skills.
I'm a florist from the Pacific Northwest.
my lifes passion is designer french fries.
I read children's books to make myself feel younger.

participant_2.background:
I drink a cup of coffee and check my email before heading out the door.
I make sure my kids are taken care of before I spend time doing what I enjoy.
I'm an avid reader of sci-fi space adventures looking for new ways to learn.
I'm happy about my new sweater, but I'm also disappointed about not getting into the gifted program.
I work hard to provide for my family and enjoy spending time with my kids and dog.

content.text: Hello! I hope you're having a nice day.
Hello! It's going well so far, thank you. How about you?
I'm doing well too. I'm a florist from the Pacific Northwest, and I'm passionate about designer french fries.
That's interesting! I'm a stay-at-home mom of two kids, and I'm an avid reader of sci-fi space adventures. I'm also trying to learn new ways to learn.
That's great! I love reading children's books to make myself feel younger. Do you have a favorite book series?
I love the Ender's Game series by Orson Scott Card. It's about a young boy who is recruited to fight an alien invasion.
I've heard good things about that series! I'll have to check it out. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my kids and dog, go for walks, and read. I also enjoy watching sci-fi movies and shows.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to spend time with my friends and family, go to concerts, and read. I also enjoy watching documentaries and learning about new things.
It sounds like we have a lot in common! I'm glad we met.
Me too! It was nice talking to you.
